location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 61 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Short administrative letter that details letters sent and received and recent comings and goings from Bushire. Letter notes that due to poor health, Lieutenant Dickson of the Rangerrequested use of a pilot (which was provided) to sail the Rangerto Muscat. Shipped by the RangerSnow.
